availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Kentucky soldier. Married to Mattie Chamberlin. Served in the 79th Pennsylvania Infantry (U.S.A.) as private and hospital steward. Served in the 9th Kentucky Infantry (U.S.A.) as Assistant Surgeon from February 23, 1862 to April 16, 1863.

ab.bibl:
Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 1, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866), 786.
Indexes to the Carded Records of Soldiers Who Served in Volunteer Organizations During the Civil War, compiled 1899-1927, documenting the perios 1861-1866National Archives catalog ID 654530, Pennsylvania, roll 19.
Compiled Service Records of Volunteer Union Soldiers who Served in Organizations From State of Kentucky, NARA RG 94, Microfilm Series M397, Roll 229.
U.S. Civil War Pension Index: General Index to Pension Files, 1861-1934, NARA RG 15, Microfilm Series T288, Application #247,435, Certificate #214,176.
